It's one of the most fun games I've ever played. It's aged impeccably well, and it offers a unique and fun zombie experience. Wether playing alone or with friends, theres something for everyone with a game like this. It's lots of fun all around.

An instant classic!

Definitely one of my favorite games from Valve. It's dark, atmospheric, and much more unsettling than the sequel. The music and scenery is desolate. The weapons sound great for a 10+ year old game, and the community is STILL active even after 11 years. Now THAT'S a dedicated fanbase. 

However, unless you're buying the bundle on sale, I recommend the sequel, Left 4 Dead 2 more for a variety of reasons.

1 - Left 4 Dead 2 has mods, Mods, mods, mods galore. These add another 100% replayability value to the game. 
2 - Left 4 Dead 2 has all the campaigns from the first and second games as well as the Sacrifice DLC. 
3 - The gore effects in Left 4 Dead 2 are much better than the first game and make the second much more violent. Organs spill from open corpses, ribcages are exposed from a single shotgun blast at center-mass, and heads and limbs fly too and fro. 

Get Left 4 Dead 2 or both the first and second in a bundle on sale. Well worth it.

十年，玩这个游戏玩了十年。
虽然技术依然挺水，虽然在大学之前玩这个都是单机玩........
舌头、跳蚤、胖子、克、妹子
二代加的口水、猴子、牛
至今为止我玩的唯一一个以联机为主要玩法的游戏
另一个——《反恐精英：零点行动》，我仅仅当成单机游戏玩：想要放松就选择普通bot，想来点挑战就选择困难bot
那时候求生之路还是买的藏经阁，现在这东西早没了，也没人提了
铁百商厦旁边的小盗版碟店，买了两张藏经阁——一张是求生之路，一张是罪恶都市
对于只玩过荣誉勋章早期作品、使命召唤124和英雄萨姆系列的我，这种玩法很是新颖
注册steam，入正，打联机，都是大学之后的事情
相比2代，还是喜欢1代
撞牛、口水、无限尸潮、近战武器的加入都是为了让游戏节奏更快，防止蹲坑
这样当然玩着更爽，但还是喜欢1代古朴经典的感觉
一个联机游戏，Metacritic拿到89分，够厉害了
它也值这个分数

没事匹配几把，最后大家也差不多都认识了
